functional.notes: Stable error codes exist and validate supports JSON output mode.

pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/cli.py validate supports --format text|json and outputs { ok, errors }.

findings: No dynamic code execution or unsafe interpolation.

maintainability.notes: Centralized error code catalog simplifies extensions.
findings: Single source of truth for codes.
